00014 #ifndef ULIB_PKCS10_H
00015 #define ULIB_PKCS10_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/date.h>
00018 #include <ulib/string.h>
00019 
00020 #include <openssl/x509.h>
00021 
00030 class U_EXPORT UPKCS10 {
00031 public:
00032 
00033         // Check for memory error
00034         U_MEMORY_TEST
00035 
00036         // Allocator e Deallocator
00037         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00038         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00039 
00044         UPKCS10(X509_REQ* _request = 0) : request(_request)
00045                 {
00046                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UPKCS10, "%p", _request)
00047                 }
00048 
00057         static X509_REQ* readPKCS10(const UString& x, const char* format = 0);
00058 
00059         UPKCS10(const UString& x, const char* format = 0)
00060                 {
00061                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UPKCS10, "%.*S,%S", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(x), format)
00062 
00063                 request = readPKCS10(x, format);
00064                 }
00065 
00070         void clear()
00071                 {
00072                 U_TRACE(0, "UPKCS10::clear()")
00073 
00074                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(request)
00075 
00076                 U_SYSCALL_VOID(X509_REQ_free, "%p", request);
00077 
00078                 request = 0;
00079                 }
00080 
00081         ~UPKCS10()
00082                 {
00083                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UPKCS10)
00084 
00085                 if (request) clear();
00086                 }
00087 
00088         // VARIE
00089 
00090         bool isValid() const
00091                 {
00092                 U_TRACE(0, "UPKCS10::isValid()")
00093 
00094                 U_RETURN(request != 0);
00095                 }
00096 
00101         static UString getSubject(X509_REQ* request);
00102 
00103         UString getSubject() const { return getSubject(request); }
00104 
00109         long getVersionNumber() const
00110                 {
00111                 U_TRACE(1, "UPKCS10::getVersionNumber()")
00112 
00113                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(request)
00114 
00115                 long version = U_SYSCALL(X509_REQ_get_version, "%p", request);
00116 
00117                 U_RETURN(version);
00118                 }
00119 
00124         UString getSignature() const
00125                 {
00126                 U_TRACE(0, "UPKCS10::getSignature()")
00127 
00128                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(request)
00129 
00130                 UString signature( (const char*) request->signature->data,
00131                                                                                                         request->signature->length );
00132 
00133                 U_RETURN_STRING(signature);
00134                 }
00135 
00140         UString getSignatureAlgorithm() const
00141                 {
00142                 U_TRACE(0, "UPKCS10::getSignatureAlgorithm()")
00143 
00144                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(request)
00145 
00146                 UString signature_algorithm( OBJ_nid2sn( OBJ_obj2nid(request->sig_alg->algorithm) ) );
00147 
00148                 U_RETURN_STRING(signature_algorithm);
00149                 }
00150 
00155         static UString getSignable(X509_REQ* request);
00156 
00157         UString getSignable() const { return getSignable(request); }
00158 
00163         EVP_PKEY* getSubjectPublicKey() const
00164                 {
00165                 U_TRACE(1, "UPKCS10::getSubjectPublicKey()")
00166 
00167                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(request)
00168 
00169                 EVP_PKEY* evp = (EVP_PKEY*) U_SYSCALL(X509_REQ_get_pubkey, "%p", request);
00170 
00171                 U_RETURN_POINTER(evp, EVP_PKEY);
00172                 }
00173 
00178         bool verify(EVP_PKEY* publicKey) const
00179                 {
00180                 U_TRACE(0, "UPKCS10::verify(%p)", publicKey)
00181 
00182                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(request)
00183 
00184                 if (U_SYSCALL(X509_REQ_verify, "%p,%p", request, publicKey) <= 0) U_RETURN(false);
00185 
00186                 U_RETURN(true);
00187                 }
00188 
00194         UString getEncoded(const char* format = "PEM") const;
00195 
00196         // STREAM
00197 
00198         friend U_EXPORT ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const UPKCS10& c);
00199 
00200 #ifdef DEBUG
00201         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00202 #endif
00203 
00204 protected:
00205         X509_REQ* request;
00206 
00207 private:
00208         UPKCS10(const UPKCS10&)            {}
00209         UPKCS10& operator=(const UPKCS10&) { return *this; }
00210 };
